content: turn work one round even round 59 repeat round 47 40 double_crochet at the end of this round join in top chain of 1st stitch 2 start 2nd arm round 60 turn repeat round 2 you should have 39 double_crochet round 61-62 repeat round 60 round 63 turn work round decrease 1 double_crochet 38 double_crochet round 64-66 repeat round 60 round 67 turn work round decrease 2 double_crochet 36 double_crochet round 68-70 repeat round 60 round 71 repeat round 67 34 double_crochet round 72-74 repeat round 60 round 75 repeat round 67 32 double_crochet round 76-78 repeat round 60 round 79 repeat round 67 30 double_crochet round 80-87 work even rounds end of sleeve do not fasten do not turn start cuff do not turn at the end of these rounds round 1 single_crochet chain 3 double_crochet in next space v_stitch made *skip next space double_crochet ch1 double_crochet in next space* to end of round join in chain 2 of 1st stitch round 2-3 single_crochet chain 3 double_crochet in next v_stitch * double_crochet chain 1 double_crochet in next v_stitch* to end of round join round 4 single_crochet chain 2 double_crochet chain 1 2 double_crochet in next v_stitch * 2 double_crochet chain 1 2dc in next v_stitch* join round 5 slip_stitch into next double_crochet single_crochet chain 4 double_crochet in next chain 1 space * double_crochet chain 2 double_crochet in next chain 1 space* to end of round join round 6-7 single_crochet chain 4 double_crochet in next v_stitch * double_crochet chain 2 double_crochet in next v_stitch* to end of round join round 8 single_crochet chain 2 double_crochet chain 2 2 double_crochet in next v_stitch * 2 double_crochet chain 2 2dc in next v_stitch* join fasten_off 3 second cuff join in between any 2 double_crochet of beginning round and follow round 1-8 of first cuff collar join with single_crochet along collar at the end of any round round 1 chain 3 double_crochet in next space v_stitch made * double_crochet chain 1 double_crochet in next space* to end of round join turn round 2 single_crochet chain 3 double_crochet in v_stitch * double_crochet chain 1 double_crochet in next v_stitch* to end of round join turn round 3 single_crochet chain 2 double_crochet chain 1 2 double_crochet in next v_stitch * 2dc chain 1 2dc in next v_stitch* to end of round join turn round 4 slip_stitch into 1st 2 double_crochet single_crochet ch5 double_crochet in next chain 1 space * double_crochet chain 2 double_crochet in next chain 1 space* to end of round join turn round 5 single_crochet chain 4 double_crochet in next v_stitch * double_crochet chain 2 double_crochet in next v_stitch* to end of round join turn round 6 repeat round 3 round 7 slip_stitch in 1st and 2nd double_crochet single_crochet chain 6 double_crochet in next chain 1 space * double_crochet chain 3 double_crochet in next chain 1 space* to end of round join turn round 8 single_crochet chain 5 double_crochet in next v_stitch * double_crochet chain 3 double_crochet in next
